org.grouplens.lenskit.util

Class Indexer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.util.Indexer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Index
    Deprecated. 
    Use MutableIdIndexMapping instead.

    @Deprecated
public class Indexer
extends java.lang.Object
implements Index
    Build contiguous 0-based indexes for long IDs.

      • internId

        public int internId(long id)
        Deprecated. 
        Get an index for an ID, generating a new one if necessary.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID.
        Returns:
        The index for id. If the ID has already been interned, the old index is returned; otherwise, a new index is generated and returned.

      • convertArrayToVector

        public MutableSparseVector convertArrayToVector(double[] values)
        Deprecated. 
        Description copied from interface: Index
        This method is used to convert arrays to sparse arrays. It takes an array of `double` values corresponding to the ids interned in the index and converts it to a sparse vector whose keys are the IDs.
        Specified by:
        convertArrayToVector in interface Index
        Parameters:
        values - A array of double value.
        Returns:
        A new sparse vector that is converted from the Array.
